body_html:
Woooo! Thanks for this help everyone.

@ojss So I got to the same place as you. The final thing I needed to do to do in order to get things working was to create a symbolic link: ln -sf /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.1.dylib

As referenced at the very bottom of the documentation: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html.

@yaroslavvb It would be nice to add a hint suggesting that SIP might need to be disabled to the documentation - took a whole morning of poking around and reinstalling things for me to find this thread.
